item.title: Using Amazon Athena for Easier AWS Log Analysis
item.description: AWS logs’ default interface can be challenging to navigate for in-depth analysis. Amazon Athena can help address two common issues. First, CloudTrail logs’ default filters can be limiting. However, with Athena, you can use SQL to apply filters to each log field, allowing for more detailed analysis and improved insights.
